CustomField.description: Stores the manufacturer that is defined in the selected model record. If a manufacturer is not defined in the selected model, this field displays the value from the Manufacturer Name field (data type: Text) in the Base Element object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically displays the manufacturer defined in the selected model. If a manufacturer is not defined, it displays the Manufacturer Name field value.
CustomField.label: Model Manufacturer
